New Records: Tabraiz Shamsi took 3 wickets for 27 runs
Key Match Events: West Indies were 5 for 2 after just seven balls
Chase and Mayers featured in a vital 81-run partnership for the third wicket
Andre Russell sent both South Africa openers back to their dressing room in his first over
Marco Jansen and Kagiso Rabada combined to see South Africa through at the death
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa captain Aiden Markram won the toss and elected to field
West Indies allrounder Roston Chase starred with bat and ball for the Maroon Men
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies captain Rovman Powell said that this is a batting performance they will try their best to forget
South Africa captain Aiden Markram said that they would have liked to be a lot more convincing with the bat in the hand
Powell urged West Indies cricket fans to view their team’s performance through wide lenses
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain temporarily halted proceedings in Antigua as West Indies and South Africa clashed in 2024 ICC T20 World Cup Super Eight action on 23 June 2024
South Africa emerged with a three-wicket win—with five balls to spare
West Indies join co-hosts United States in saying goodbye to the 2024 World Cup
